abstract: Proxy materials have been delivered to Biogen Idec by Carl Icahn, as the billionaire investor seeks greater control of the biotechnology company’s board, a source familiar with the situation told Reuters.
snippet: Proxy materials have been delivered to Biogen Idec by Carl Icahn, as the billionaire investor seeks greater control of the biotechnology company’s board, a source familiar with the situation told Reuters.
lead_paragraph: Proxy materials have been delivered to Biogen Idec  by Carl C. Icahn, as the billionaire investor seeks greater control of the biotechnology company’s board, a source familiar with the situation told Reuters.

headline.main: Icahn Said to Seek More Control Over Biogen
